New Records: The combination of Tyrese Haliburton, Bennedict Mathurin, Andrew Nembhard, Thomas Bryant, and Obi Toppin set the record for the lowest number combination ever for one team in an NBA game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The NBA allows 00 as a number for players to wear, which is strange.
Others: The Pacers beat the Chicago Bulls 129-113, giving them their fourth win in a row and their tenth win in their last 13 games. They are now up to sixth in the Eastern Conference standings. Thomas Bryant got the start instead of Myles Turner, who was out due to an illness. The Pacers are still waiting for Aaron Nesmith to return from his injury.
